API Collection# AtomicRepresentable Implementations

## [Topics](/documentation/Swift/UInt16/AtomicRepresentable-Implementations#topics)

### [Type Aliases](/documentation/Swift/UInt16/AtomicRepresentable-Implementations#Type-Aliases)

[`typealias AtomicRepresentation`](/documentation/swift/uint16/atomicrepresentation)The storage representation type that `Self` encodes to and decodes from which is a suitable type when used in atomic operations.### [Type Methods](/documentation/Swift/UInt16/AtomicRepresentable-Implementations#Type-Methods)

[`static func decodeAtomicRepresentation(consuming UInt16.AtomicRepresentation) -> UInt16`](/documentation/swift/uint16/decodeatomicrepresentation(_:))Recovers the logical atomic type `Self` by destroying some `AtomicRepresentation` storage instance returned from an atomic operation.[`static func encodeAtomicRepresentation(borrowing UInt16) -> UInt16.AtomicRepresentation`](/documentation/swift/uint16/encodeatomicrepresentation(_:))Destroys a value of `Self` and prepares an `AtomicRepresentation` storage type to be used for atomic operations.
